content: *this funky lizard bookmark is fast and fun to make the ease of the pattern makes it a great first project lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80356ad published in by kids for kids skill level beginner lion® wool article #820 1 ball 158 yards crochet hook - size e-4 3 5 mm 2 small googly eyes small piece of red felt craft glue exact gauge is not essential to this project
